attributes.action: the goverment hiding behind private contactors such as CAPITA,ATOS,MAXIMUS
attributes.additional_details: MP,s are paid to keep control of NHS,EDUCATION,POLICING, yet are using these made up companies to make them money from persecuting everything and everyone and sit in the background....these contractors are nothing but liars and scammers
attributes.background: These private contractors know nothing about what they are put in charge with  take ATOS a IT company from france in charge of healthcare

rejection.details:
We understand you are concerned about the Government's use of contractors but we are not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition calling on the Government to end all contracts with private suppliers and run public services itself if that is what you would like to see.
